name: Machine Learning
title: Future is all about machine learning enroll and stay 2 steps ahead of others
details: Interested in the field of Machine Learning? Then this course is for you!This course has been designed by two professional Data Scientists so that we can share our knowledge and help you learn complex theory, algorithms, and coding libraries in a simple way. We will walk you step-by-step into the World of Machine Learning. With every tutorial, you will develop new skills and improve your understanding of this challenging yet lucrative sub-field of Data Science.
